data.title: Earnings Summary: Hormel Foods Q1
data.description:
Hormel Foods (NYSE:HRL) just disclosed its Q1 earnings on Thursday, February 26, 2026 at 06:30 AM.

Here's a brief overview of the earnings report.

Earnings

Hormel Foods beat estimated earnings by 6.25%, reporting an EPS of $0.34 versus an estimate of $0.32.

Revenue was up $43.70 million from the same period last year.

Analysis of Past Earnings

Last quarter the company beat on EPS by $0.02 which was followed by a 0.75% increase in the share price the next day.

Here's a look at Hormel Foods's past performance:

New investors should note that it is sometimes not an earnings beat or miss that most affects the price of a stock, but the guidance (or forecast).

Guidance

Hormel Foods management provided guidance for FY 2026, expecting earnings between $1.43 and $1.51 per share.
